description: Essentially sequence A055932 generated using A000120, hence sorted by number of factors.
comments: Note that for n>0 the prime divisors of a(n) are consecutive primes starting with 2. All of the least prime signatures (A025487) are included; with the other values forming A056808.Using the formula, terms of b(n)= a(n)/A057334(n) are: 1, 1, 2, 2, 4, 4, 6, 6, 8, ..., indeed a(n) repeated. - _Michel Marcus_, Feb 09 2014
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {my(v = vector(nn)); v[1] = 1; for (i=2, nn, v[i] = mg(i-1)*v[(i+1)\2];); v;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 09 2014
author: _Alford Arnold_, Aug 27 2000
extensions: More terms from Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Mar 29 2003
